syntax.sql_syntax_error: SQL syntax is invalid or malformed
syntax.invalid_alias: Table or column alias is incorrectly defined

schema_link.table_missing: Required table is not included in the query
schema_link.col_missing: Required column is missing from SELECT or WHERE clause
schema_link.ambiguous_col: Column name is ambiguous (exists in multiple tables without table qualifier)
schema_link.incorrect_foreign_key: Foreign key relationship is not properly used in JOIN

join.join_missing: Required JOIN is missing to connect tables
join.join_wrong_type: Wrong JOIN type used (INNER vs LEFT vs RIGHT)
join.extra_table: Unnecessary table included in FROM/JOIN clause
join.incorrect_col: Wrong column used in JOIN ON condition

filter.where_missing: WHERE clause is missing when filtering is required
filter.condition_wrong_col: Wrong column used in WHERE condition
filter.condition_type_mismatch: Data type mismatch in WHERE condition (e.g., string vs number)

aggregation.agg_no_groupby: Aggregate function used without GROUP BY
aggregation.groupby_missing_col: Column in SELECT not included in GROUP BY
aggregation.having_without_groupby: HAVING clause used without GROUP BY
aggregation.having_vs_where: HAVING used instead of WHERE or vice versa

value.hardcoded_value: Value is hardcoded instead of using parameter or column
value.value_format_wrong: Value format is incorrect (e.g., date format, string quotes)

subquery.unused_subquery: Subquery is defined but not used

set_operations.union_missing: UNION operation is missing when combining results
set_operations.intersect_missing: INTERSECT operation needed but not used
set_operations.except_missing: EXCEPT/MINUS operation needed but not used

other.order_by_missing: ORDER BY is missing when sorting is required
other.limit_missing: LIMIT clause is missing when top N results needed
other.duplicate_select: Column is duplicated in SELECT clause
other.unsupported_function: SQL function is not supported by the database
